name: Jaime L. Garcia
text: Can confirm battery bulge when it started dying on me at 20% power. I use an S4 Active, which shares the same chassis and battery as the S4, but with a poorer camera and slight water resistance built into the exterior.    The Bulge is generally a sign of overcharging. (Even for a factor of a few minutes, cumulatively, it adds up and ruins the battery.)
